languages.text: "Шерин, лишь тебе решать, кто будет следовать за тобой..." {n}Лоб Джай прорезает морщина.{/n} "...но я всегда опасалась тех, кто превращал веру в Великого в омертвевший догмат".

"Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."
languages.original_text: "Шерин, лишь тебе решать, кто будет следовать за тобой..." {n}Лоб Джай прорезает морщина.{/n} "...но я всегда опасалась тех, кто превращал веру в Великого в омертвевший догмат".

traits.locale_text: "Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A wrinkle appears on Jae's unblemished forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

"Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A wrinkle appears on Jae's unblemished forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

"Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

"Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

languages.text: «Solo usted puede decidir a quién seguir, shereen...». {n}Jae arruga la frente.{/n} «... Pero a mí nunca me ha inspirado confianza la gente que convierte la fe en el Exaltado en una serie de principios decadentes».
languages.original_text: "Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

traits.locale_text: «Solo usted puede decidir a quién seguir, shereen...». {n}Jae arruga la frente.{/n} «... Pero a mí nunca me ha inspirado confianza la gente que convierte la fe en el Exaltado en una serie de principios decadentes».

languages.text: 「シェリーン、誰があなたについてくるか、決められるのはあなた自身…」{n}ジェイの頭には線が浮かび上がった。{/n}「…しかし、私は常に、エグザルテッド・ワンへの信仰を病的な主義主張に変えてしまう人々に警戒心を抱いてきた」
languages.original_text: "Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、誰があなたについてくるか、決められるのはあなた自身…」{n}ジェイの頭には線が浮かび上がった。{/n}「…しかし、私は常に、エグザルテッド・ワンへの信仰を病的な主義主張に変えてしまう人々に警戒心を抱いてきた」

languages.text: “无论你想让谁跟着你，这都是你的决定，亲爱的……”{n}婕伊的额头上浮现了一条皱纹。{/n}“……不过，有些人总是会把献给至高无上的神皇的信仰变成死气沉沉的准则，我会始终提防这样的人。”
languages.original_text: "Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

traits.locale_text: “无论你想让谁跟着你，这都是你的决定，亲爱的……”{n}婕伊的额头上浮现了一条皱纹。{/n}“……不过，有些人总是会把献给至高无上的神皇的信仰变成死气沉沉的准则，我会始终提防这样的人。”

languages.text: "Nur Ihr könnt entscheiden, wer Euch folgen soll, Shereen ..." {n}Eine Falte erscheint auf Jaes Stirn.{/n} "... aber ich habe jene stets abgelehnt, die aus dem Glauben an den Erhabenen ein todgeweihtes Prinzipienbündel gemacht haben."
languages.original_text: "Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

traits.locale_text: "Nur Ihr könnt entscheiden, wer Euch folgen soll, Shereen ..." {n}Eine Falte erscheint auf Jaes Stirn.{/n} "... aber ich habe jene stets abgelehnt, die aus dem Glauben an den Erhabenen ein todgeweihtes Prinzipienbündel gemacht haben."

languages.text: « C'est à vous {mf|seul|seule} de décider qui vous suivra, shereen... {n}Une ride barre le front de Jae.{/n} ... mais je me suis toujours méfiée de ceux qui réduisent la foi en l'Exalté à un corpus de préceptes mortifères. »
languages.original_text: "Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."

traits.locale_text: « C'est à vous {mf|seul|seule} de décider qui vous suivra, shereen... {n}Une ride barre le front de Jae.{/n} ... mais je me suis toujours méfiée de ceux qui réduisent la foi en l'Exalté à un corpus de préceptes mortifères. »

languages.text: "Kimin peşinden geleceğine yalnızca sen karar verebilirsin şirinim..." {n}Jae'nin alnında bir çizgi beliriyor.{/n} "Ancak ben, Görkemli'ye olan inancını ölümcül prensiplere çevirenlerden her zaman sakınmışımdır."
languages.original_text: "Only you can decide who will follow you, shereen..." {n}A line appears on Jae's forehead.{/n} "...but I have always been wary of those who turn belief in the Exalted One into a moribund set of principles."
